title: Knife, ca. 1660
markings: On blade: "v k y m", crowned 0 on ferrule; small snake-shaped mark in rectangular border
creditline: The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg
description: Leaf-shaped blade has curved upper edge. Octagonal silver ferrule, engraved. Faceted agate handle, tapering towards the point, small projections on one side of handle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Knife, ca. 1660.
ca. 1660. steel, silver, agate. The Robert L. Metzenberg Collection, gift of Eleanor L. Metzenberg. 1985-103-122.
